forest_clearing.name: Forest Clearing
forest_clearing.description: A peaceful clearing surrounded by tall ancient trees. Sunlight filters through the canopy above, creating dancing patterns on the forest floor. A gentle breeze carries the scent of pine and wildflowers.

dark_cave.name: Dark Cave
dark_cave.description: A mysterious cave entrance yawns before you like a mouth full of shadows. The air is cool and damp, and you can hear the distant sound of dripping water echoing from within.

mountain_path.name: Mountain Path
mountain_path.description: A winding stone path carved into the mountainside. The view stretches for miles across rolling valleys and distant peaks. The air is thin and crisp at this altitude.

village_outskirts.name: Village Outskirts
village_outskirts.description: The edge of a small village with thatched-roof cottages and well-tended gardens. Smoke rises from chimneys, and you can hear the distant sounds of daily life.

hidden_grove.name: Hidden Grove
hidden_grove.description: A secret grove hidden deep in the forest, where ancient magic still lingers. Glowing mushrooms provide an ethereal light, and the trees seem to whisper ancient secrets.

cave_depths.name: Cave Depths
cave_depths.description: The deeper chambers of the cave system, where darkness reigns supreme. Strange formations and mineral deposits glitter in your torchlight.

mountain_peak.name: Mountain Peak
mountain_peak.description: The highest point of the mountain, where the world stretches endlessly in all directions. An ancient shrine sits at the summit, weathered by centuries of wind and snow.

village_center.name: Village Center
village_center.description: The bustling heart of the village, with a marketplace, inn, and town hall. Villagers go about their daily business, and the atmosphere is warm and welcoming.

rusty_key.name: Rusty Key
rusty_key.description: An old, rust-covered key that looks like it might open something important.

healing_herbs.name: Healing Herbs
healing_herbs.description: A bundle of medicinal herbs that could restore health when used properly.

ancient_torch.name: Ancient Torch
ancient_torch.description: A well-crafted torch that seems to burn with an otherworldly flame.

cave_crystals.name: Cave Crystals
cave_crystals.description: Beautiful crystals that emit a soft, blue glow. They might be valuable to collectors.

climbing_rope.name: Climbing Rope
climbing_rope.description: A sturdy rope perfect for scaling cliffs or descending into depths.

magic_crystal.name: Magic Crystal
magic_crystal.description: A powerful crystal pulsing with arcane energy. It feels warm to the touch and hums with potential.

village_map.name: Village Map
village_map.description: A hand-drawn map showing the layout of the village and surrounding areas.

bread_loaf.name: Fresh Bread
bread_loaf.description: A warm loaf of bread that smells absolutely delicious.

forest_guardian.name: Forest Guardian
forest_guardian.description: A tall, ethereal being made of bark and leaves who protects the forest.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome, traveler. The forest has been expecting you.
dialogue.quest: The ancient balance has been disturbed. Will you help restore it?
dialogue.farewell: May the forest spirits guide your path.

cave_hermit.name: Cave Hermit
cave_hermit.description: An old man who has lived in the caves for decades, studying ancient mysteries.

dialogue.greeting: Ah, another soul drawn to the depths. What brings you here?
dialogue.quest: I've been searching for the Lost Tome of Shadows. Have you seen it?
dialogue.farewell: The caves hold many secrets, young one.

village_elder.name: Village Elder
village_elder.description: A respected leader of the village, known for wisdom and fairness.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to our humble village, traveler.
dialogue.quest: We've been troubled by strange happenings lately. Perhaps you could investigate?
dialogue.farewell: Safe travels, and remember our village fondly.

traveling_merchant.name: Traveling Merchant
traveling_merchant.description: A well-dressed merchant with a cart full of exotic goods from distant lands.

dialogue.greeting: Come see my wares! The finest goods from across the realm!
dialogue.quest: I'm looking for rare items to trade. Bring me something special!
dialogue.farewell: Until we meet again on the roads!

forest_spirit.name: Forest Spirit
forest_spirit.description: An ancient spirit of the grove, appearing as a shimmering figure of light and shadow.

dialogue.greeting: Mortal... you have found the sacred grove.
dialogue.quest: The crystal's power must be awakened. Are you worthy?
dialogue.farewell: The grove remembers all who enter.

restore_forest_balance.title: Restore the Forest Balance
restore_forest_balance.description: The Forest Guardian speaks of a disturbance in the natural order. Investigate and restore balance to the forest.
objectives: Find the source of the disturbance

find_lost_tome.title: Find the Lost Tome
find_lost_tome.description: The Cave Hermit seeks an ancient tome that was lost in the deeper caves.
objectives: Locate the Lost Tome of Shadows
Return it to the Cave Hermit

investigate_strange_happenings.title: Investigate Strange Happenings
investigate_strange_happenings.description: The village has been experiencing unusual events. Get to the bottom of the mystery.
objectives: Talk to villagers about the happenings
Report findings to the Village Elder

forest_ambush.name: Forest Bandits
forest_ambush.description: A group of bandits emerges from behind the trees, blocking your path!

mountain_rockslide.name: Rockslide
mountain_rockslide.description: Loose rocks begin tumbling down the mountainside! You need to find shelter quickly.

outcomes.success: You find shelter and avoid injury.
outcomes.failure: You're caught in the rockslide and take damage.

cave_discovery.name: Hidden Chamber
cave_discovery.description: Your torch reveals a hidden chamber carved into the cave wall.

opening: You find yourself standing at the edge of a vast wilderness, your past shrouded in mystery.
The morning mist clears as you emerge from the forest, unsure of how you arrived here.
Ancient magic stirs in the air as you begin your unexpected journey.
The call of adventure echoes in your heart as you take your first steps into the unknown.
location_discovery: As you explore further, you discover {location_name}.
Your path leads you to {location_name}, a place of wonder and mystery.
Through careful exploration, you find your way to {location_name}.
The journey brings you to {location_name}, where new adventures await.
item_found: Hidden among the surroundings, you discover {item_name}.
Your keen eyes spot {item_name} tucked away in an unlikely place.
Fortune smiles upon you as you find {item_name}.
npc_encounter: You encounter {npc_name}, who greets you with interest.
Your path crosses with {npc_name}, leading to an unexpected meeting.
As you explore, you come across {npc_name}.
{npc_name} appears before you, ready to share their knowledge.
